profiledesc.langusage: The finding aid is written in English

corpname.subordinate_name: Western Wayne County Chapter (Wayne County, Mich.)

did.unittitle: Western Wayne County Chapter of the National Organization for Women records

archdesc.bioghist: Formerly the Northwest Wayne County Chapter of the National Organization for Women.
archdesc.scopecontent: Minutes of meetings and agenda materials, 1984-1993; newsletters, 1980-1995; and files from yearly meetings of the Michigan Conference of the National Organization for Women.
